languages.text: {n}Бровь Хейнрикса взмывает вверх.{/n} "Ваше, Лорд-капитан, беспокойство о моих... потребностях весьма неожиданно. Желаете восполнить мой недостаток общения? Я был бы не против приятной беседы, если для этого у вас когда-нибудь найдется время".

traits.locale_text: {n}Бровь Хейнрикса взмывает вверх.{/n} "Ваше, Лорд-капитан, беспокойство о моих... потребностях весьма неожиданно. Желаете восполнить мой недостаток общения? Я был бы не против приятной беседы, если для этого у вас когда-нибудь найдется время".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix's brow shoots upward.{/n} "Your concern for my... needs, Lord Captain, is extremely unexpected. Would you like to remedy my deficit of personal interaction? I would not be opposed to a pleasant conversation, if you can find the time."
languages.original_text: {n}Бровь Хейнрикса взмывает вверх.{/n} "Ваше, Лорд-капитан, беспокойство о моих... потребностях весьма неожиданно. Желаете восполнить мой недостаток общения? Я был бы не против приятной беседы, если для этого у вас когда-нибудь найдется время".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's brow shoots upward.{/n} "Your concern for my... needs, Lord Captain, is extremely unexpected. Would you like to remedy my deficit of personal interaction? I would not be opposed to a pleasant conversation, if you can find the time."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's brow shoots upward.{/n} "Your concern for my... needs, Lord Captain, is extremely unexpected. Would you like to remedy my deficit of personal interaction? I would not be opposed to a pleasant conversation, if you can find the time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's brow shoots upward.{/n} "Your concern for my... needs, Lord Captain, is extremely unexpected. Would you like to remedy my deficit of personal interaction? I would not be opposed to a pleasant conversation, if you can find the time."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's brow shoots upward.{/n} "Your concern for my... needs, Lord Captain, is extremely unexpected. Would you like to remedy my deficit of personal interaction? I would not be opposed to a pleasant conversation, if you can find the time."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希扬起了眉毛。{/n}“你如此关心我的……需求，这令我非常意外，舰长大人。你愿意弥补我在人际交往方面的不足之处吗？如果你有时间的话，我绝不会拒绝与你进行一场愉快的谈话。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's brow shoots upward.{/n} "Your concern for my... needs, Lord Captain, is extremely unexpected. Would you like to remedy my deficit of personal interaction? I would not be opposed to a pleasant conversation, if you can find the time."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希扬起了眉毛。{/n}“你如此关心我的……需求，这令我非常意外，舰长大人。你愿意弥补我在人际交往方面的不足之处吗？如果你有时间的话，我绝不会拒绝与你进行一场愉快的谈话。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Las cejas de Heinrix se alzan de un salto.{/n} «Su preocupación por mis... necesidades, Lord Capitán, es completamente inesperada. ¿Le gustaría solucionar mi déficit de interacción personal? No me opongo a una conversación placentera, si puede hacer tiempo para ella».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's brow shoots upward.{/n} "Your concern for my... needs, Lord Captain, is extremely unexpected. Would you like to remedy my deficit of personal interaction? I would not be opposed to a pleasant conversation, if you can find the time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las cejas de Heinrix se alzan de un salto.{/n} «Su preocupación por mis... necesidades, Lord Capitán, es completamente inesperada. ¿Le gustaría solucionar mi déficit de interacción personal? No me opongo a una conversación placentera, si puede hacer tiempo para ella».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは眉をひそめた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、あなたが私の求めるものへ関心を払ってくれるとは意外だ。個人的な交流不足を改善したいのだろうか？もし時間があるならば、楽しい会話をしても構わないが」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's brow shoots upward.{/n} "Your concern for my... needs, Lord Captain, is extremely unexpected. Would you like to remedy my deficit of personal interaction? I would not be opposed to a pleasant conversation, if you can find the time."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは眉をひそめた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、あなたが私の求めるものへ関心を払ってくれるとは意外だ。個人的な交流不足を改善したいのだろうか？もし時間があるならば、楽しい会話をしても構わないが」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' hebt die Augenbrauen.{/n} "Eure Sorge um meine ... Bedürfnisse, Lord Captain, kommt höchst unerwartet. Möchtet Ihr mein Defizit an persönlicher Interaktion beheben? Ich hätte gegen angenehme Konversation nichts einzuwenden, wenn Ihr die Zeit dafür entbehren könnt."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's brow shoots upward.{/n} "Your concern for my... needs, Lord Captain, is extremely unexpected. Would you like to remedy my deficit of personal interaction? I would not be opposed to a pleasant conversation, if you can find the time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' hebt die Augenbrauen.{/n} "Eure Sorge um meine ... Bedürfnisse, Lord Captain, kommt höchst unerwartet. Möchtet Ihr mein Defizit an persönlicher Interaktion beheben? Ich hätte gegen angenehme Konversation nichts einzuwenden, wenn Ihr die Zeit dafür entbehren könnt."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hausse un sourcil.{/n} « Votre inquiétude pour mes... besoins est plus qu'inattendue, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Souhaitez-vous remédier à mon manque d'interactions personnelles ? Je ne serais pas contre une plaisante conversation, si vous avez le temps. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's brow shoots upward.{/n} "Your concern for my... needs, Lord Captain, is extremely unexpected. Would you like to remedy my deficit of personal interaction? I would not be opposed to a pleasant conversation, if you can find the time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hausse un sourcil.{/n} « Votre inquiétude pour mes... besoins est plus qu'inattendue, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Souhaitez-vous remédier à mon manque d'interactions personnelles ? Je ne serais pas contre une plaisante conversation, si vous avez le temps. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's brow shoots upward.{/n} "Your concern for my... needs, Lord Captain, is extremely unexpected. Would you like to remedy my deficit of personal interaction? I would not be opposed to a pleasant conversation, if you can find the time."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in kaşları kalkıyor.{/n} "Arzularıma gösterdiğin alaka... Ziyadesiyle şaşırtıcı Lord Kaptan. Karşılıklı etkileşim açlığımı mı dindirmek niyetindesin? Vaktin olduğunda hoş bir sohbete hayır demem doğrusu."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's brow shoots upward.{/n} "Your concern for my... needs, Lord Captain, is extremely unexpected. Would you like to remedy my deficit of personal interaction? I would not be opposed to a pleasant conversation, if you can find the time."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix'in kaşları kalkıyor.{/n} "Arzularıma gösterdiğin alaka... Ziyadesiyle şaşırtıcı Lord Kaptan. Karşılıklı etkileşim açlığımı mı dindirmek niyetindesin? Vaktin olduğunda hoş bir sohbete hayır demem doğrusu."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
